contentrichtext.text: :''The term ''Qingzhen'' can also refer to [[Islam in China|Chinese Muslims]] or the [[Hui people|Hui]] ethnic group.'' '''Qingzhen''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 清镇; [[Pinyin]]: Qīngzhèn) is a [[county-level city]] under the administration of [[Guiyang]] in [[Guizhou]] province of the [[People's Republic of China]]. ==External links== *[http://www.gzqz.gov.cn/ Official website of Qingzhen Government] {{county-level divisions of Guizhou}} {{coord|26|33|N|106|28|E|region:CN_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Cities in Guizhou|Qingzhen]] [[Category:Guiyang]] [[Category:County-level divisions of Guizhou]] {{Guizhou-geo-stub}}
